[windows] stop # FIXME

# test chezmoi cd
chezmoi cd
exists $HOME/.local/share/chezmoi
grep -count=1 $HOME/.local/share/chezmoi shell.log

# test chezmoi cd with command with args
[!exec:bash] stop
env HOME=$WORK/home2/user
chezmoi cd
stdout version

-- home2/user/.config/chezmoi/chezmoi.toml --
[cd]
    command = "bash"
    args = ["--version"]
